This must be called when the Inliner pass is entered, to allow the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> update internal state, as result of function passes run between Inliner pass runs (for the same module). <a href="#aaaec1d89794dccf1f6d02c0e46258796">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="void"

This must be called when the Inliner pass is exited, as function passes may be run subsequently. <a href="#a42079a872d9a000c124cef0d38723741">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

### onPassEntry() {#aaaec1d89794dccf1f6d02c0e46258796}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MLInlineAdvisor::onPassEntry (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph/scc">LazyCallGraph::SCC</a> &#42; SCC)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This must be called when the Inliner pass is entered, to allow the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> update internal state, as result of function passes run between Inliner pass runs (for the same module).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-h/#l00036">36</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-h">MLInlineAdvisor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-cpp/#l00195">195</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-cpp">MLInlineAdvisor.cpp</a>.

### onPassExit() {#a42079a872d9a000c124cef0d38723741}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MLInlineAdvisor::onPassExit (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph/scc">LazyCallGraph::SCC</a> &#42; SCC)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This must be called when the Inliner pass is exited, as function passes may be run subsequently.

This allows an implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> to prepare for a partial update, based on the optional SCC.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-h">MLInlineAdvisor.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-cpp/#l00245">245</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/mlinlineadvisor-cpp">MLInlineAdvisor.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
